message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $1,350,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value of $1,500,000. We are confident that this offer will provide you with a great opportunity to maximize your investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to you and our current market conditions, we are willing to negotiate at a price of $1,300,000. This still represents a significant discount compared to the market value, while also allowing us to cover our costs and ensure a fair profit. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.
